tspan.tspan: and glassware by cleaning and rinsing
Make ready all the required reagent
standard solution of ammonia and American
boric acid and mixed indicator in all 3 flask
Make sure all the connections correct and
Start the distillation till boric acid and
distillate. Cool the distillate and titrate
. Unit solution turn pale lavender colour and
note down the reading for calculation
